text: @bridget_joy_ I'm afraid people are going to forget how many people died due to the inactions of the Trump administration. Hey, we all now have masks. We can eat a steak at a restaurant. Unemployment is going down, Wall Street back up. COVID19 deaths are normalized. Hooray.
